text: (But those who keep their duty to their Lord) those who believe in Allah's divine Oneness, i.e. Abu Bakr and his believing brothers, (for them are lofty halls) they have canopies (with lofty hails above them) raised above them, (built (for them), beneath which) beneath its houses and trees (rivers) of wine, water, honey and milk (flow. (It is) a promise of Allah. Allah faileth not His promise) to the believers.
